BentoGridSection.card1Description: Manage reservations, orders, and customer data all in one place.
BentoGridSection.card2Description: Seamless integration for pickup and delivery orders directly from your site.
BentoGridSection.card3Description: Engage customers with automated campaigns and loyalty programs.
BentoGridSection.card4Description: Gain valuable data to understand and grow your customer base.
BentoGridSection.defaultDescription: Discover powerful features integrated seamlessly into one intuitive platform, designed for growth.

Metadata.description: Next.js internationalization (i18n) starter kit with Arabic, Chinese & English support. Includes shadcn UI, theme switching, and RTL support.
Metadata.keywords: Next.js, i18n, internationalization, Arabic, Chinese, multilingual, boilerplate, starter template, shadcn UI, RTL support
